com.box.boxjavalibv2.authorization

Class SharedLinkAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.restclientv2.authorization.DefaultRequestAuth
      • com.box.boxjavalibv2.authorization.SharedLinkAuthorization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxRequestAuth

    public class SharedLinkAuthorization
extends DefaultRequestAuth
    Shared link authorization. This authorization can be used in addition to other authorization(currently only OAuth) to support authorization to access a shared link.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.box.restclientv2.authorization.DefaultRequestAuth
